experience.title: Research & Development
experience.description: Development of Brain-Computer Interfaces for Gaming. Focused on creating innovative BCI applications for entertainment and therapeutic purposes, working with cutting-edge neurotechnology hardware and software solutions.
responsibilities: Developed BCI gaming applications using Unity and C#
Implemented machine learning algorithms for real-time EEG signal processing
Collaborated with interdisciplinary teams on neurogaming research projects
Participated in international hackathons and research competitions
achievements: Won 1st place at BR41N.IO 2024 hackathon with BCHJam project
Published research paper on BCI music interfaces in IEEE conference

experience.title: Research Engineer
experience.description: Research and development of ML pipelines in Python for neuroscience applications. Specialized in developing algorithms for emotion recognition and neurofeedback systems using wearable EEG devices.
responsibilities: Developed machine learning pipelines for EEG signal analysis
Implemented emotion recognition algorithms using Python and scikit-learn
Designed and conducted neuroscience experiments with human subjects
Collaborated with product teams to integrate research findings into commercial applications
achievements: Developed emotion classification system with 85% accuracy
Published research on music-emotion recognition using wearable BCIs

experience.title: Research Engineer, Intern
experience.description: Master's thesis research project in Python on emotions classification during music listening. Collaboration between University of Twente and myBrainTechnologies to develop real-time emotion recognition systems.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented emotion classification algorithms
Conducted experiments with EEG data collection during music listening
Developed data preprocessing pipelines for EEG signal analysis
Wrote comprehensive research thesis on emotion recognition using BCIs
achievements: Successfully defended master's thesis with highest honors
Developed novel approach to real-time emotion recognition

experience.title: Research Developer, Intern
experience.description: Research project in Unity on collaborative remote environment using Virtual and Augmented Reality and MRTK. Focused on developing innovative solutions for remote collaboration during the early COVID-19 pandemic period.
responsibilities: Developed VR/AR applications using Unity and MRTK
Implemented collaborative features for remote work environments
Researched human-computer interaction in mixed reality spaces
Prototyped innovative interaction paradigms for spatial computing
achievements: Created functional prototype for AR-enhanced collaboration
Published research report on AR Notes collaborative system

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Development of Java SpringBoot distributed applications with API REST for several B2B projects. Worked on enterprise-level solutions for various clients in the technology and finance sectors.
responsibilities: Developed scalable backend systems using Java SpringBoot
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for B2B applications
Worked with distributed systems and microservices architecture
Collaborated with frontend developers and product managers
Participated in code reviews and technical architecture discussions
achievements: Successfully delivered multiple client projects on time and within budget
Implemented efficient database solutions improving system performance by 40%

experience.title: Software Engineer, Intern
experience.description: Bachelor's thesis project on the evaluation of MongoDB's performance for distributed B2B applications. Research-focused internship that led to full-time employment with the company.
responsibilities: Conducted comprehensive performance analysis of MongoDB
Developed benchmarking tools for database performance evaluation
Analyzed scalability patterns for distributed applications
Wrote detailed technical thesis on NoSQL database optimization
achievements: Offered full-time position based on internship performance
Developed performance testing framework still used by the company

current_focus.PhD_research: Generalization of Brain-Computer Interfaces for Gaming
future_goals: Establish research lab focusing on BCI applications
